name: @matianfu/impress
description: a request/express equivalent for resource protocol (rp)

scripts.test: sudo env NODE_PATH=. PATH=$(dirname $(which node)):$PATH nodemon --exec mocha test
scripts.dest: sudo env NODE_PATH=. PATH=$(dirname $(which node)):$PATH DEBUG="express:*" nodemon --exec mocha test
scripts.dest1: sudo env NODE_PATH=. PATH=$(dirname $(which node)):$PATH DEBUG="express:*" nodemon --exec mocha

author: matianfu@gmail.com
